title: ICC Women's World Cup 2022 Final: Australia vs England - A Clash of Titans!
content:
Get ready for a thrilling showdown as **Australia** and **England** lock horns in the **ICC Women's Cricket World Cup 2022 final**!  The two cricketing powerhouses are set to battle it out for the coveted trophy, promising an intense match that will test their skills and determination. 

While Australia boasts an impressive unbeaten run and a record-breaking winning streak, England has defied the odds, staging a remarkable comeback after a shaky start. The **final**, scheduled for **April 3rd**, will be a rematch of the 2017 semi-final, where **England emerged victorious**,  leaving Australia to seek revenge.

Both teams are hungry for victory, aiming to etch their names in history.  Will Australia claim a record-extending seventh World Cup title or will England defend their crown? Tune in to find out!
author: Scroll Staff
